channel.title: How Do i add mute command?
channel.description: im wanting to add mute command please someone give the guide?

item.title: How Do i add mute command?
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“mute”) && playerRights > 0) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

                    p.muted = true;
		writeLog(p.playerName, "mutes");
		sM("You have muted "+p.playerName+"!");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to mute..");
            }
        }[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: How Do i add mute command?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“Rune_Life, post:2, topic:268808”]like so

[code] if (command.startsWith(“mute”) && playerRights >= 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

                    p.muted = true;
		writeLog(p.playerName, "mutes");

p.sM(
"You were muted by " + playerName);
sM(“You have muted “+p.playerName+”!”);
} else {
sM(“The name doesnt exist.”);
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sM(“Try entering a name you want to mute…”);[/code][/quote]
Holy hell, clean up that code. It looks horrible.
Plus, it wouldn’t even compile.
